sources.title: Pierce Brosnan - Mister Johnson (1990) One man outsmarts the empire‚Äîand pays the price
sources.description:
A colonial dreamer dances on the edge of two worlds | When ambition clashes with reality in 1920s Nigeria.

Charismatic clerk Johnson navigates British colonial bureaucracy with charm and cunning, determined to live like an English gentleman. But his web of schemes and loyalties unravels when cultural divides prove impossible to bridge. Bruce Beresford‚Äôs adaptation of the famous Joyce Cary novel.
